thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M03 22, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: Move Over Hoodies: The Half-Zip Has Arrived

author: Chris Kornelis
title: Move Over Hoodies: The Half-Zip Has Arrived
text:
THE HALF-ZIP sweatshirt is having an identity crisis. It’s not as casual as your standard hoodie, yet it can’t quite keep a straight face like a middle-management merino sweater. The good news: By straddling that line between relaxed and refined, it’s doing men a favor.
“I can see a guy wearing khakis with this and I can see a guy wearing sweatpants with this,” said Jose Villanueva, co-owner of Chicago menswear shop Notre, of the new half-zip sweatshirt from Sweden’s Très Bien that he recently stocked. “It’s pretty damn versatile.”...
